Package tilegame

Class TileGameModel

java.lang.Object
tilegame.TileGameModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameModel2048, SokobanGameModel
public abstract class TileGameModel extends Object
The class TileGameModel allows programmers to develop their own tile game model and manipulate it.

  • Method Details

    • updateGameGrid

      public void updateGameGrid(int[][] newGameGrid)
      Updates the game grid to a new game grid and informs observes of the update.
      Parameters:
      newGameGrid - This is the new game grid
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if game grid is smaller than 1x1

    • getTileState

      public int getTileState(int row, int column)
      Gets an element at a particular row and column position
      Parameters:
      row - - Specified Row
      column - - Specified Column
      Returns:
      Element at specified position
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if row or column are outside game grid.

    • getTileState

      public int getTileState(int position)
      Gets an element at tile position counting from 0 to rows * columns.
      Parameters:
      position - A position between 0 and rows * columns
      Returns:
      Element at specified position
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if position is outside game grid.

    • setTileState

      public void setTileState(int value, int row, int column)

      Parameters:
      value - - New value you want to set at particular position
      row - - Specified Row
      column - - Specified Column
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if position is outside game grid.

      Gets the grid for the game
